channel.title: Need help with code
channel.description:
ok well i want to add something to herblore filling up vials... and i dont know what to make it look like
like if item 229 use on object 4159 remove them 2 and add the wfv i know about the command like the remove item just not the if item and object thing thanks!@

item.title: Need help with code
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

     		if (UsedOnObjectID == 4159 && ItemID == 229) {
        			pEmote = emoteidhere;
        			deleteItem(229, 1);
        			addItem(waterfilledvialid, 1);
        			sendMessage("You fill the vial with water.");
			}
